settings.content: FAQ: [Home Page Setup](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/2491823-turbo-home-page-overview) | [Dropdown Menu](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942350-creating-a-dropdown-menu) | [Adding Tabs](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942364-adding-tabs) | [Sale Banners](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942366-products-on-sale) | [Related Products](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942378-related-products) | [Home Page Featured Links](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942377) | [Page of Collections](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/1132818-page-of-collections) | [Content Page Video](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942365) | [Product Page Video](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/1059911) | [Adding Columns](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/2161351) | [Page Templates](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/2165303)
If you need any assistance, please visit our [Support Center](http://support.outofthesandbox.com)
Third-party apps and add-ons can sometimes require a full page refresh. If your app is not displaying properly, select Sport mode.

settings.label: Enable styled tables
settings.info: This will add borders and padding to your tables

settings.label: New, pre-order, and coming soon banners
Enable solid menu background color
settings.info: This will enable a solid header over the banner images

settings.label: Enable menu background transparency
settings.info: This will make the sticky menu semi-transparent throughout the shop

settings.label: Use a password page background image
Stretch background to fill the password page

settings.label: Use a footer logo
settings.info: Shop logo will be displayed by default

settings.label: Content page
settings.info: Displayed above the social media icons

settings.content: Choose the order of your home page sections.

settings.label: Position behind main menu
settings.info: Display the first section behind or below the main menu

settings.content: The banner images will span the full width of the layout. The recommended image size is 1600x1000, while the maximum image size is 2048x2048.
This flexible section can feature 1-8 items that can link to any content in the shop.
Show links to collections, products, pages, and blogs.
Display up to two different collections on your home page, in 'slider' style or the standard column grid layout.

Display each product in a collection in detail (this includes an Add to Cart button, to enable purchase directly from the home page). To showcase a single product, create a collection that contains only that product.
The content from these pages will look great when displayed between the banner images.
Show recent blog articles on the home page.
For best results, upload images that are around 1280px in width and under 600px in height. Try to keep your slideshow images the same size.
Show Twitter and Instagram timeline profile feeds.
After enabling reviews you will need to install the free [Shopify Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app.

settings.label: Display star rating on product listings
Display star rating on product page
Show quick view full product description
Street address
settings.info: The full address that will be placed on the map.

settings.label: Mini cart checkout
settings.info: Proceed to checkout from the mini cart

settings.label: Shipping rates calculator default country selection

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.

settings.label: Show read more link for article excerpts
Show additional articles on article page
Enable [DISQUS](http://disqus.com/) comments (instead of Shopify's default comments)
Enable article banner image
settings.info: The article's featured image will be used as a full-width banner

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://docs.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).
Although you will be able to display prices on your storefront in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: USD CAD INR GBP AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.content: To test the popup feature, set the number of days until the popup is displayed again to Test Mode.

settings.label: Days until popup is displayed again

settings.content: This section appears directly above the footer on all pages. The text that appears here can be edited in the Language Editor under the General tab > Newsletter Form.
